Small Key.message: You opened the drawer in the side table with the old key.

objects.name: Key
objects.examine: It might fit into one of the door locks.

objects.name: Coat Stand
objects.examine: A single black coat hangs on it. The pockets of the coat are empty.

objects.name: Side Table
objects.examine: It has a drawer with a lock, which is locked.

objects.name: Gas Lamp
objects.description: A gas lamp on the side table.
objects.examine: It's very old and rusty and might not even work anymore.
